title: Google\Cloud\Core\RestTrait
name: RestTrait
description: Provides shared functionality for REST service implementations.

params.name: requestBuilder
params.description: Builds PSR7 requests from a service definition.

params.name: requestWrapper
params.description: Wrapper used to handle sending requests to the JSON API.

methods.name: send
methods.description: Delivers a request built from the service definition.

params.name: resource
params.description: The resource type used for the request.

params.name: options
params.description: Options used to build out the request.
